event.name: Debate
event.description: Join us for a spirited celebration of Karnataka Rajyotsava as we host a dynamic debate event, dedicated to honoring the rich culture and language of Kannada. Engage in thought-provoking discussions as participants eloquently express their perspectives on topics that reflect the essence of Karnataka's heritage. This event honors Karnataka's linguistic and cultural diversity, fostering a platform for ideas to flourish and the Rajyotsava spirit to thrive. Come be a part of this intellectually stimulating celebration of Kannada language and culture.

Stage_1: Each team member speaks for and against a motion, chosen a day before the event.
3 minutes per speech, followed by a judge's question for 1 minute.
Stage_2: Four teams qualify to the British Parliamentary-style round, with 15 minutes of prep time (no internet).
Each participant speaks for 3 minutes, with a single question from the opposing side lasting 15 seconds.

Timing.Stage_1: 3 minutes per speaker, plus 1 minute for questions.
Timing.Stage_2: 3 minutes per speech, plus a 1-minute Q&A per team.

rules.JudgingCriteria: Argument clarity, adherence to topic, response quality.
rules.Prohibitions: Disrespectful language or interruptions.

event.name: Just A Minute (JAM)
event.basic_rules: Individual event. Consists of three rounds.
event.description: In 'Just a Minute,' participants must demonstrate quick thinking and smooth delivery, speaking flawlessly on assigned topics. Join this exciting event to showcase your eloquence and wit.

Round_1: Participants pick a yellow chit (topic) and a red chit (word not to be used).
2 minutes of prep time and 1 minute of speaking time.
Round_2: Participants write answers to questions displayed on slides within the time limit.
Only the first answer written will be considered.
Round_3: Participants tell a story based on a given genre in 2.5 minutes.
Creativity, fluency, and adherence to the 'no English' rule are evaluated.

rules.Prohibitions: Use of the forbidden word or derogatory language.

event.name: Creative Writing
event.description: Ignite the power of your pen and unleash your creativity to create a masterpiece. Let your words speak and take the spotlight with creative writing, showcasing the magic of your imagination.

Stage_1: Participants are given a common prompt to write a story in English or Kannada within 30 minutes.
Top 8 participants will be selected for the next stage.
Stage_2: Finalists choose one picture and incorporate a personalized line into their story within 15 minutes.

rules.Prohibitions: Plagiarism or inappropriate content.

event.name: Student Quiz
event.description: Test your knowledge of Karnataka's rich culture and history in this fun and educational quiz. Join fellow enthusiasts in a challenging and engaging event that celebrates our heritage.

Stage_1: Elimination round with general questions on Karnataka’s culture, poets, places, and movies.
Top-scoring teams move to the next stage.
Stage_2: Final round with quiz questions based on Karnataka's personalities, landmarks, and achievements.
15 questions with clues displayed on a screen.

rules.Prohibitions: Use of electronic devices.

event.name: Rangoli
event.description: Create vibrant patterns with colorful powders and bring the tradition of rangoli to life! Join us for an enchanting event where your creativity takes center stage. Express your artistic flair on the canvas of the floor, celebrating the beauty of colors and Karnataka's culture.

Single Stage: Participants have 1 hour and 30 minutes to create a rangoli.
Designs must adhere to the medium chosen (poster colors, flower petals, sawdust, pulses, or rice).

rules.JudgingCriteria: Creativity, color combinations, and adherence to the medium.
rules.Prohibitions: No use of adhesives or pre-made designs.

event.name: Paint on Anything
event.description: We bring you an opportunity to relive your childhood with 'Paint on Anything.' Join us and unleash your inner child by painting on any surface of your choice.

Single Stage: Participants can paint on any surface of their choice (stone, face, etc.).
Only paints are allowed; no accessories or additional materials can be used.

rules.PermittedResources: Participants bring their own painting materials.
rules.Prohibitions: Use of materials other than paints.

event.name: Doodling
event.description: Join our doodling art competition and bring your spontaneous creativity to the forefront! Celebrate freehand drawing by showcasing your doodling prowess.

Single Stage: Participants are given paper to doodle within the time limit.
No extra paper will be provided.

rules.PermittedResources: Participants bring their own stationery (pens, markers, etc.).
rules.Prohibitions: Use of extra paper or any pre-made references.

event.name: Origami
event.description: Come join us to test your skills in the ancient art of paper folding known as Origami! Fold your favorite model with precision and detail and stand a chance to win prizes!

Single Stage: Participants fold papers to create their origami models.
No cutting is allowed; gluing is allowed only for presentation.

rules.JudgingCriteria: Creativity, presentation, and adherence to rules.
rules.Prohibitions: Use of phones or copying designs.

event.name: Cosplay
event.description: Celebrate Karnataka's spirit and unleash your creativity with our cosplay competition! Depict the rich culture and heroism of Karnataka through traditional costumes.

Single Stage: Participants showcase their costumes inspired by Karnataka's traditional attire, folklore, or literature.
Each participant has 2–3 minutes to present on stage.

rules.Prohibitions: Use of hazardous materials or disrespectful depictions.

event.name: Heavenly Voices
event.basic_rules: Individual event, two categories: Light vocal solo (Filmy/Bhavageethe) and Classical vocal solo (Pure classical).
event.description: Heavenly voices is a platform to embark on a musical adventure where every note, every lyric, and every performance paints a vibrant picture of our homeland Karnataka.

Light Vocal Solo: Participants perform Bhavageethe, Filmy, or Bhajan songs in Kannada.
Classical Vocal Solo: Participants perform in Hindustani or Carnatic style.

rules.Prohibitions: Songs in languages other than Kannada for light vocals.

event.name: Student Antyakshari
event.description: Student Antyakshari is a lively team-based musical game popular in Indian culture. During this event, participants form teams and take turns singing Sandalwood songs.

Stage_1: Teams sing Sandalwood songs taking turns.
Stage_2: Advancing teams compete in challenging rounds.
Stage_3: Top teams compete in a final elimination round.

Timing.Each Round: Each round has a set time limit announced on the spot.

rules.Prohibitions: Use of electronic devices or incorrect lyrics.

event.name: Dance Off
event.description: Join us for an electrifying clash of rhythm and energy at our MSRIT Dance Off! Witness fierce performances as talented dancers showcase their moves.

Preliminary Round: Participants perform a 1+1 minute routine or freestyle to a DJ's choice.
Battle Rounds: Freestyle dance-off; finalists battle with increasing round durations.

rules.Prohibitions: Vulgarity in moves, costumes, or physical contact.
JudgmentCriteria: Accuracy and creativity of dance moves.

event.name: Indian Dance
event.description: Participate in the Indian Dance Solo Competition. Perform, impress the judges, and win exciting prizes.

Single Stage: Perform solo in chosen category: Classical, Folk, or Bollywood.
Judged on choreography, expression, timing, and authenticity.

event.name: Hook Steps Contest
event.description: Join us for an electrifying dance extravaganza as we present the Hook Steps Contest! High-energy event showcasing mesmerizing dance talents.

Round 1: Teams perform hook steps for 3 chits (songs) in sequence.
Round 2: Rapid-fire round; members perform randomly played songs.

rules.Prohibitions: Missing steps or incorrect choreography.

event.name: Know Our Land
event.basic_rules: Group event of 2-4 members. Exclusive for non-Kannadigas.
event.description: 'Know our land' spreads a glimpse of Karnataka’s literature and culture to non-Kannadigas. Celebrate Kannada Rajyotsava 2024 by showcasing your knowledge of Karnataka.

Round 1: Guess famous Karnataka personalities and places.
Round 2: Quiz on Karnataka culture and achievements.
Round 3: Solve puzzles and place landmarks on a Karnataka map.

rules.Prohibitions: Use of mobile phones.
JudgmentCriteria: Accuracy in identifying clues and answers.
Depth of knowledge about Karnataka culture and history.

event.name: Bon Voyage
event.basic_rules: Group event of 3 members. Exclusive for non-Kannadigas.
event.description: Not all treasure is gold and silver made. This hunt is for every non-Kannadiga. Let's find out what the clues will lead to in this journey.

Multiple Rounds: Participants solve clues and complete tasks at various checkpoints.

Timing.Each Round: Each round has time constraints announced on spot.

rules.Prohibitions: Use of mobile phones or external help.
JudgmentCriteria: Efficiency in completing tasks within time limits.

event.name: Minute to Win It
event.description: Test your skills, beat the clock! Get ready for an adrenaline-packed evening of fun, teamwork, and competition! Teams are challenged to complete various tasks in a limited time frame.

Stage_1: Teams complete a series of five tasks.
Tasks must be completed within the given time limit.

rules.Prohibitions: Misbehavior or rule violations lead to disqualification.
JudgmentCriteria: Adherence to rules and time management.

event.name: Hemmeya Kannadiga and Kannadati
event.description: Everyone takes pride in being recognized as Kannadiga/Kannadati. It’s time to win this splendid title through this flagship event of Kannada Rajyotsava.

Stage_1: Participants answer questions about Karnataka's culture, heritage, and language.
Stage_2: Finalists perform impromptu tasks or answer rapid-fire questions.

Timing.Each Round: Time limits per stage announced on spot.

rules.Prohibitions: Use of mobile phones or external assistance.
JudgmentCriteria: Knowledge of Karnataka's culture, heritage, and language.
Spontaneity and creativity in impromptu tasks.

event.name: Acting Arena
event.description: Acting is a beautiful art where an artist lives the character of the story to entertain the audience. Acting Arena is a great platform providing you the opportunity to bring out the talented actors in you.

Stage_1: Teams perform a pre-prepared skit within the time limit.
Stage_2: Teams perform an impromptu skit based on a given situation.

rules.Prohibitions: Use of offensive language or inappropriate content.
JudgmentCriteria: Acting skills, including dialogue delivery and expressions.

event.name: Cine Prapancha
event.description: Who isn't a fan of movies? Cine Prapancha is a wonderful event that delights you with an amazing cinematic experience. Showcase your splendid knowledge of Kannada movies!

Stage_1: Quiz round with trivia about Kannada movies and actors.
Stage_2: Identify movie clips, dialogues, or music from Kannada cinema.
Stage_3: Final round tests deep cinematic knowledge through puzzles and rapid questions.

Timing.Each Round: Each round has a specific time limit announced on the spot.

rules.Prohibitions: Use of mobile phones or other devices.
JudgmentCriteria: Speed and accuracy in identifying movie-related content.
Team coordination and creativity in the final round.

event.name: Cooking Without Fire
event.description: A feast for the eyes and taste buds! Showcase your culinary creativity in 'Cooking Without Fire,' where innovation meets taste and the best chefs will be awarded!

Single Stage: Teams prepare dishes without the use of fire.
Focus on creativity, presentation, and taste.

Timing.Each Round: All dishes must be completed within 1 hour.

rules.PermittedResources: Participants bring their own ingredients and utensils.
rules.Prohibitions: No precooked, preboiled, or prechopped items.
JudgmentCriteria: Taste and innovation in using ingredients.
Adherence to the theme and rules.

event.name: Treasure Hunt
event.description: Embark on an exhilarating treasure hunt adventure! Solve puzzles, follow cryptic clues, and unravel mysteries hidden throughout the college in this thrilling event.

Multiple Rounds: Teams solve clues and complete tasks to progress through checkpoints.

Timing.Each Round: Time limits for each round are set on the spot.

rules.Prohibitions: Use of mobile phones or external help.
JudgmentCriteria: Efficiency in completing tasks within time limits.

event.name: Criminal Inquest
event.description: Dive into the role of a detective in 'Criminal Inquest.' Solve clues, piece together puzzles, and unravel mysteries to unveil the elusive criminal.

Multiple Rounds: Participants solve crime-based puzzles and complete tasks.

Timing.Each Round: Time limits for each stage are announced on the spot.

rules.Prohibitions: Use of mobile phones or external assistance.

event.name: Mock Auctions
event.description: Participate in the 'Mock Auction' game, where strategy, negotiation, and decision-making take center stage. Bid on players, build a strong team, and stay within your budget!

Stage 1: Initial quiz round determines the order of bidding.
Stage 2: Participants bid on players, strategizing to build the strongest team within a budget.

Timing.Each Round: Each bidding session has a specific time limit.

rules.Prohibitions: Exceeding budget or breaking auction rules.
JudgmentCriteria: Effective utilization of the allocated budget.

event.name: Reels Making
event.description: Capture the essence of Kannada Rajyotsava Fest 2024! Film and edit the vibrant colors, traditions, and energy of the fest into a one-minute reel.

Single Stage: Create a high-quality, one-minute reel reflecting Kannada Rajyotsava Fest 2024.

Timing.Each Round: Submit the reel within the deadline (date to be announced).

rules.PermittedResources: Participants may use phones or cameras to record.
rules.Prohibitions: Content with offensive language, politics, or sensitive topics.
JudgmentCriteria: Creativity and originality in the reel.
Adherence to the theme of Kannada Rajyotsava Fest 2024.

event.name: Ramaiah’s Staffs Got Talent
event.description: Join us for an unforgettable event of entertainment, inspiration, and camaraderie as Ramaiah's staff showcase their exceptional talents in music, dance, mimicry, art, and many other fields. This event is exclusive for teaching and non-teaching staff of RIT!

Round 1: Participants showcase their talent (e.g., music, dance, mimicry, art).
Props and materials, if required, must be brought by the participant.
Judges score performances on a scale of 10.
Round 2: Participants pick chits containing various activities.
Preparation time of 5 minutes is given.
Performances or activities are evaluated on a scale of 10.

Timing.Each Round: Each participant will get up to 5 minutes for preparation in Round 2 and appropriate time slots during performances.

rules.PermittedResources: Participants may bring their own materials, such as sheets, pens, colors, or props, needed for their performance.
rules.Prohibitions: Content with offensive language, politics, or sensitive topics.

event.name: Staff Quiz
event.basic_rules: Group event of 3 members. Exclusive for staff.
event.description: A quiz centered on the rich culture of Karnataka, which helps students and staff to be more interested in the culture and history around them.

Timing.Each Round: Each round lasts for 30 minutes. Total event duration will depend on the number of rounds.

rules.PermittedResources: Participants can only use pens and papers provided by the organizers.

Preliminary Round: Questions will be based on Karnataka's culture, history, and current events.
Each team must submit answers within the allotted time.
Final Round: Top teams will participate in a rapid-fire round.
Quick response times and accuracy will determine winners.

JudgingCriteria: Speed of response in the final round.

event.name: Staff Antyakshari
event.basic_rules: Group event of 2-3 members. Exclusive for staff.
event.description: Staff Antyakshari is a lively team-based musical game popular in Indian culture. During this event, participants form teams and take turns singing Sandalwood songs. Teams compete against each other, showcasing their knowledge of songs from various genres. The game involves spontaneity, quick thinking, and a love for melodies, creating an engaging and entertaining atmosphere within the workplace.

Timing.Each Round: Each team gets 1 minute to respond during their turn. Total duration depends on the number of teams.

rules.PermittedResources: No use of mobile phones or other devices is allowed. Teams may only rely on their knowledge of songs.

Preliminary Round: Teams must sing songs starting with the last letter of the previous team’s song.
Songs must be from Sandalwood movies.
Final Round: A themed round where songs must fit the announced theme.
Speed and accuracy in singing songs will be emphasized.

event.name: Gaming
event.basic_rules: Mobile Gaming Tournament: Group event of 4-5 members.
event.description: Join us for an exciting BGMI tournament as part of our KR event. Showcase your skills, compete with fellow students, and aim for victory. All participants are welcome to register and be a part of this competitive gaming experience.

Timing.Each Round: Each match lasts for 15-20 minutes, depending on the game format.

rules.PermittedResources: Only mobile phones are allowed. Participants must use their registered BGMI usernames.

Knockout Rounds: Teams compete in TDM matches. Losing teams are eliminated.
Top teams progress to the semifinals and finals.
Finals: Winning teams from knockout stages compete in the final match.
Points are calculated based on kills and survival.

JudgingCriteria: Adherence to gaming rules and fair play.
AdditionalRules: No hacks or unfair software tools are allowed.
Judges’ and referees’ decisions are final.

event.name: Photography
event.basic_rules: Individual event. Only for phone photography.
event.description: In 'Face-off Fest,' dive into the world of photography where creativity meets emotion. Engage in capturing portraits that tell a story, expressions that evoke powerful emotions. This event is a platform that inspires everyone to view the fest through a new lens called Emotions. Come, be a part of this enthralling journey to capture the best feeling of the fest!

Timing.Each Round: Participants must capture and upload photos within the time allotted by the organizers.

rules.PermittedResources: Only phone cameras are allowed. Basic editing is permitted, but no AI enhancements or addition/removal of elements.

Submission Stage: Participants submit up to 4 photos based on the event theme.
Both original and edited versions must be provided if editing is done.

AdditionalRules: Photos must be captured during the event timeframe.
No offensive or inappropriate content is allowed.
